item.title: 桑坦德银行模型风险主管门西亚据说将离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）的一位顶级风险专家将在七年后离开这家西班牙银行。【原文：One of Banco Santander SA’s top risk experts is leaving the Spanish lender after seven years, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 债券交易员一周大交易结束，美联储降息更加不确定
item.description: 债券市场越来越不相信美联储会在今年再降息两次。【原文：The bond market is growing less convinced by the day that the Federal Reserve will embark on two further interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 谷歌利用影响力和最后通牒达成加州新闻交易
item.description: 谷歌正在商议斥资 1.1 亿美元支持加州苦苦挣扎的新闻业，但这家搜索巨头有一个要求：纳税人也需要捐助数千万美元。【原文：Google was negotiating to spend $110 million to support California’s struggling journalism industry, but the search giant had a demand: taxpayers would need to contribute tens of millions of dollars as well.】

item.title: 法国政府称提高电力税不会打击消费者
item.description: 法国表示，提高电力税的提议不会损害大多数家庭的利益，因为法国的目标是以 606 亿欧元（约合 663 亿美元）的资金解决其岌岌可危的公共财政问题，并重建投资者的信心。【原文：France says a proposed increase to its power tax won’t hurt most households as it aims to deliver a €60.6 billion ($66.3 billion) fix for its creaking public finances and rebuild investor confidence.】

item.title: 印度工业产值两年来首次下降
item.description: 印度 8 月份的工业生产出现了近两年来的首次萎缩，使世界上扩张速度最快的经济体增长放缓的迹象更加明显。【原文：India’s industrial production contracted for the first time in almost two years in August, adding to signs that growth in the world’s fastest-expanding economy is moderating.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为尽管巴西经济增长回升，但巴西股市依然黯淡无光
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师尼古拉-利普曼（Nikolaj Lippmann）表示，巴西经济增长速度超过预期，股票价格也很便宜。但他警告说，不要指望这会转化为股市的反弹。【原文：Brazil’s economy is growing faster than expected and stocks are cheap, said Morgan Stanley strategist Nikolaj Lippmann. Just don’t expect that to translate into a rally in equities, he warned.】

item.title: 欧洲风力发电量因飓风 "柯克 "余波而飙升
item.description: 飓风 "柯克 "的余威继续对欧洲造成影响，据彭博模型预测，周日的风力将达到二月份以来的最高值。【原文：The remnants of Hurricane Kirk are continuing to have an impact on Europe with the highest wind generation on Sunday since February forecast by Bloomberg models.】

item.title: 俄罗斯力推金砖国家支付系统，旨在打破美国的主导地位
item.description: 俄罗斯正在提议改变金砖国家之间进行的跨境支付，目的是规避全球金融体系，因为这个受到严厉惩罚的国家正在努力保护自己的经济不受制裁。【原文：Russia is proposing changes to cross-border payments conducted among BRICS countries aimed at circumventing the global financial system, as the heavily penalized country seeks to sanctions-proof its own economy.】

item.title: CoreWeave 完成 6.5 亿美元信贷融资，推动人工智能云计算发展
item.description: 由摩根大通、高盛和摩根士丹利牵头的 6.5 亿美元信用贷款已经完成，该贷款将用于支持公司的发展。【原文：CoreWeave Inc., a cloud-computing provider that’s among the most valuable artificial intelligence startups, has closed a $650 million credit facility led by JPMorgan, Goldman Sachs, and Morgan Stanley that is intended to be used to support growth.】

item.title: 芝加哥马拉松赛将向创下世界纪录后去世的肯尼亚人致敬
item.description: 今年的美国银行芝加哥马拉松赛将充满苦乐参半的味道。【原文：There will be a bittersweet taste to this year’s Bank of America Chicago Marathon.】

item.title: Apax Partners 将停止医疗保健投资并解散团队
item.description: Apax Partners 已决定停止对医疗保健资产的新投资，因为这家私募股权公司认为该行业的机会越来越少。【原文：Apax Partners has decided to halt new investments into health care assets as the private equity firm sees fewer opportunities in the industry.】

item.title: 在金属交易商反对后，芝加哥商品交易所封锁了 Istim 仓库
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，CME 集团最近拒绝 Istim Metals 公司铝仓库注册的决定受到了金属市场参与者反馈意见的影响，其中一些人反对该公司上市。【原文：CME Group’s recent decision to deny an aluminum warehouse registration by Istim Metals was influenced by feedback from metal market participants, some of whom objected to the listing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 软件工具制造商 JFrog 吸引收购兴趣
item.description: 据知情人士透露，为软件开发人员提供工具的技术公司 JFrog Ltd. 已引起潜在收购者的初步收购兴趣。【原文：JFrog Ltd., a technology company that makes tools for software developers, has attracted preliminary takeover interest from potential suitors, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 信贷公司 HPS 创始人将收获数十亿美元，起诉者纷至沓来
item.description: 随着竞争对手集团争相在红火的私人信贷市场分一杯羹，一场针对 HPS Investment Partners 的潜在竞购战将使其三位创始人的财富膨胀。【原文：A potential bidding war for HPS Investment Partners is set to swell the fortunes of its three founders as rival groups vie for a piece of the red-hot private credit market.】

item.title: Polestar 首席执行官称电动汽车制造商必须开始 "积极销售汽车
item.description: Polestar Automotive Holding UK Plc 的新任首席执行官 Michael Lohscheller 对这家陷入困境的电动汽车制造商的运营和战略进行了审查，此前该公司公布的第三季度交付量低于预期。【原文：Polestar Automotive Holding UK Plc’s new Chief Executive Officer Michael Lohscheller has launched a review of the struggling electric-car maker’s operations and strategy, after the company reported weaker-than-expected deliveries for the third quarter.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚将于 10 月 16 日开始出售 Ethio Telecom 10% 的股份
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚将于下周开始出售其最大电信运营商 Ethio Telecom 10% 的股份，然后在该国新的证券交易所上市。【原文：Ethiopia will start selling a 10% stake next week in its largest telecommunications operator Ethio Telecom, ahead of a listing on the country’s new stock exchange.】

item.title: 诺埃尔-塔塔（Noel Tata）成为塔塔信托的新任主管，负责管理价值 1650 亿美元的集团
item.description: 塔塔信托（Tata Trusts）是间接控制塔塔集团的一个慈善团体，该团体已任命诺埃尔-塔塔（Noel Tata）为新任主席，他将接替拉坦-塔塔（Ratan Tata），负责管理一个遍布 100 个国家、价值 1,650 亿美元的庞大商业帝国。【原文：Tata Trusts, a collective of charities that indirectly controls the Tata Group, has appointed Noel Tata as the new chairman, who will succeed Ratan Tata and oversee a sprawling a $165 billion business empire spread across 100 countries.】

item.title: 大石油公司提醒市场基础薄弱
item.description:
壳牌、英国石油公司（BP）和埃克森石油公司（Exxon）都认为炼油利润率疲软将影响第三季度利润。【原文：

Shell, BP and Exxon all see feeble refining margins weighing on third-quarter profits.

】

item.title: 谷歌获得诺贝尔奖使人们关注科学研究重点的变化
item.description: 诺贝尔奖引发了对谷歌研究精神的质疑。但首先...【原文：A Nobel Prize raises some questions about the spirit of research at Google. But first...】

item.title: 低索赔率提高收益，Tryg 股价大涨
item.description: Tryg A/S 在哥本哈根的交易中创下近 9 个月来的最大涨幅，此前这家丹麦保险公司公布的盈利超过了分析师的预期，这主要得益于索赔额的下降。【原文：Tryg A/S jumped the most in almost nine months in Copenhagen trading after the Danish insurer reported earnings that beat analyst estimates, helped by lower claims.】

item.title: 俄罗斯收紧对寻求撤离的外国企业的限制
item.description: 俄罗斯打算让试图退出其市场的外国公司承受更大的经济痛苦，让它们只能得到其资产价值的一小部分。【原文：Russia intends to increase the financial pain for foreign companies seeking to exit its market, leaving them with only a fraction of the value of their assets.】

item.title: Stellantis 供应商 CLN 制定业务计划，债务问题迫在眉睫
item.description: 意大利 CLN-Coils Lamiere Nastri SpA 公司正在与普华永道合作制定一项业务计划，因为这家 Stellantis NV 公司的供应商受到了汽车行业需求疲软的打击。【原文：Italy’s CLN-Coils Lamiere Nastri SpA is working with PricewaterhouseCoopers on a business plan after the supplier to Stellantis NV was hit by weakening demand for the auto sector.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。大型银行财报季开始了，大多数美联储官员没有被通胀报告吓到，特斯拉推出了机器人出租车。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Big bank earnings season starts, most Fed officials weren’t fazed by the inflation report and Tesla unveils its robotaxi. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 瑞士公司 EIP 准备出价增持 BayWa Renewable Arm 股份
item.description: 瑞士投资者 Energy Infrastructure Partners 正准备出价增持 BayWa AG 可再生能源部门的股份，这笔交易将为这家陷入困境的德国大宗商品公司提供债务重组的救命稻草。【原文：Swiss investor Energy Infrastructure Partners is preparing a bid to boost its stake in the renewables arm of BayWa AG in a deal that will offer the struggling German commodities firm a lifeline in its debt restructuring.】

item.title: 吉利旗下Lynk & Co.关税下调，吉利在米兰发布新型电动汽车
item.description: 浙江吉利控股集团有限公司的国际扩张似乎并未因欧盟对中国制造的电动汽车征收进口关税而受阻，该公司旗下的 Lynk & Co.【原文：Zhejiang Geely Holding Group Co.’s international expansion doesn’t appear to have been waylaid by European Union import tariffs on Chinese-made electric vehicles with the company’s Lynk & Co. brand launching its first EV for the bloc on Friday.】

item.title: 特斯拉发布 "无牙 "机器人出租车后，优步和 Lyft 股价大涨
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. and Lyft Inc. climbed in early trading after Tesla Inc.’s Elon Musk offered few details on the carmaker’s plans for a self-driving vehicle service that could compete with ride-hailing.】

item.title: 在亚洲，亚马逊更青睐太阳能和风能，而非核能
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）目前只考虑利用风能和太阳能为亚洲的项目提供绿色电力，尽管全球科技公司已开始研究利用核能发电为高能耗的数据中心供电。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is currently only looking at wind and solar to offer green power for projects in Asia, even as global technology companies begin examining nuclear generation to supply energy-hungry data centers.】

item.title: Northvolt 筹措 2 亿欧元临时资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，陷入困境的瑞典电池制造商 Northvolt AB 周一会见了多个利益相关方，寻求 2 亿欧元（2.19 亿美元）的新资金。【原文：Struggling Swedish battery maker Northvolt AB met with multiple stakeholders on Monday as it seeks €200 million ($219 million) in fresh funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁加剧，印度可能受到小幅冲击
item.description: 据彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）称，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提议对所有国家加征关税，印度经济可能只会受到轻微冲击，因为这位美国总统候选人加大了对南亚国家的贸易警告力度。【原文：India’s economy will likely take only a marginal hit from Donald Trump’s proposed tariff hikes on all countries, according to Bloomberg Economics, as the US presidential candidate ratchets up his trade warnings to the South Asian nation.】

item.title: 贝莱德私人市场增长，资产达到 11.5 万亿美元
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）上季度为其长期投资基金吸纳了 1600 亿美元的客户现金，使这家全球最大的货币基金管理公司的资产规模达到创纪录的 11.5 万亿美元，因为它正努力成为股票、债券以及越来越多的私人资产的一站式服务机构。【原文：BlackRock Inc. pulled in $160 billion of client cash to its long-term investment funds last quarter, pushing the world’s largest money manager to a record $11.5 trillion of assets as it seeks to become a one-stop shop for stocks, bonds and, increasingly, private assets.】
